abstract: P.R. missteps at BP, Toyota and Goldman Sachs raise a question: Are some crises impossible to spin?
snippet: P.R. missteps at BP, Toyota and Goldman Sachs raise a question: Are some crises impossible to spin?
lead_paragraph: Whoever suggested that all publicity is good publicity clearly never envisioned the wave of catastrophe engulfing high-profile corporations over the last year, laying waste to some of the most meticulously tailored reputations on earth, Peter S. Goodman writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: In Case of Emergency: What Not to Do
